trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult" /> value that represents a visual object that is returned from a hit test.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult" /> 值，表示从命中测试返回的视觉对象。

trans-unit.source: Represents a callback that is used to customize hit testing.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于自定义命中测试的回叫。

trans-unit.source: WPF invokes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback" /> to report hit test intersections to the user.
trans-unit.target: WPF 调用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback" />，向用户报告命中测试交集。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterBehavior" /> that represents the action resulting from the hit test.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.HitTestFilterBehavior" />，它表示从命中测试中产生的操作。

trans-unit.source: The hit test callback method defines the actions that you perform when a hit test is identified on a particular visual object in the visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 命中的测试回叫方法定义命中的测试标识上的可视化树中的特定可视化对象时执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: After you perform the actions, your callback is expected to return a <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultBehavior> value that determines whether to continue iterating through the visual tree for any other visual objects.
trans-unit.target: 执行操作后，应回调返回<xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultBehavior>值，该值确定是否要继续循环访问任何其他视觉对象的可视化树。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to invoke <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.HitTest%2A> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback> value.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.HitTest%2A>使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResultCallback>值。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding hit test callback method is also defined.
trans-unit.target: 此外定义相应的命中的测试回调方法。
